verses.verse: וַתֵּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> went out דִינָה֙ <S%H1783><s%> And Dinah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> of Leah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> which she bare לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob לִרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see בִּבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> the daughters הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וַיַּ֨רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֹתָ֜הּ <S%H853><s%> שְׁכֶ֧ם <S%H7927><s%> And when Shechem בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲמ֛וֹר <S%H2544><s%> of Hamor הַֽחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivite נְשִׂ֣יא <S%H5387><s%> prince הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the country וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> her he took אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> her and lay אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H854><s%> her by וַיְעַנֶּֽהָ׃ <S%H6031><s%> with her and defiled her

וַתִּדְבַּ֣ק <S%H1692><s%> clave נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> And his soul בְּדִינָ֖ה <S%H1783><s%> unto Dinah בַּֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וַיֶּֽאֱהַב֙ <S%H157><s%> and he loved אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ <S%H5291><s%> the damsel וַיְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and spake עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> kindly הַֽנַּעֲרָֽ׃ <S%H5291><s%> unto the damsel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake שְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> And Shechem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חֲמ֥וֹר <S%H2544><s%> Hamor אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying קַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> Get לִ֛י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּלְדָּ֥ה <S%H3207><s%> me this damsel הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> for לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וְיַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob שָׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> heard כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for טִמֵּא֙ <S%H2930><s%> that he had defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּינָ֣ה <S%H1783><s%> Dinah בִתּ֔וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> now his sons הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> were with מִקְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H4735><s%> were with his cattle בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וְהֶחֱרִ֥שׁ <S%H2790><s%> held his peace יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּאָֽם׃ <S%H935><s%> until they were come

וַיֵּצֵ֛א <S%H3318><s%> went out חֲמ֥וֹר <S%H2544><s%> And Hamor אֲבִֽי־ <S%H1><s%> the father שְׁכֶ֖ם <S%H7927><s%> of Shechem אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob לְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> to commune אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> with

וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob בָּ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> out of the field כְּשָׁמְעָ֔ם <S%H8085><s%> when they heard וַיִּֽתְעַצְּבוּ֙ <S%H6087><s%> were grieved הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> and the men וַיִּ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> wroth לָהֶ֖ם מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and they were very כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because נְבָלָ֞ה <S%H5039><s%> folly עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> because he had wrought בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel לִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> in lying אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for בַּֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> with Jacob's וְכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> such לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵעָשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> which thing ought not to be done

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> communed חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2544><s%> And Hamor אִתָּ֣ם <S%H854><s%> for לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> with them saying שְׁכֶ֣ם <S%H7927><s%> Shechem בְּנִ֗י <S%H1121><s%> of my son חָֽשְׁקָ֤ה <S%H2836><s%> longeth נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> The soul בְּבִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> for your daughter תְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> I pray you give נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> her him to wife

וְהִֽתְחַתְּנ֖וּ <S%H2859><s%> And make ye marriages אֹתָ֑נוּ <S%H854><s%> for בְּנֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1323><s%> your daughters תִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> with us [and] give לָ֔נוּ וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> our daughters תִּקְח֥וּ <S%H3947><s%> unto us and take לָכֶֽם׃

וְאִתָּ֖נוּ <S%H854><s%> for תֵּשֵׁ֑בוּ <S%H3427><s%> And ye shall dwell וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> with us and the land תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before you שְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> dwell וּסְחָר֔וּהָ <S%H5503><s%> and trade וְהֵֽאָחֲז֖וּ <S%H270><s%> ye therein and get you possessions בָּֽהּ׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁכֶם֙ <S%H7927><s%> And Shechem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her אָבִ֣יה <S%H1><s%> unto her father וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אַחֶ֔יהָ <S%H251><s%> and unto her brethren אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> Let me find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> in your eyes וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whatever תֹּאמְר֛וּ <S%H559><s%> and what ye shall say אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> then אֶתֵּֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> unto me I will give

הַרְבּ֨וּ <S%H7235><s%> Ask עָלַ֤י <S%H5921><s%> ever מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> me never so much מֹ֣הַר <S%H4119><s%> dowry וּמַתָּ֔ן <S%H4976><s%> and gift וְאֶ֨תְּנָ֔ה <S%H5414><s%> and I will give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after תֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> according as ye shall say אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וּתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> unto me but give לִ֥י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ <S%H5291><s%> me the damsel לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַיַּעֲנ֨וּ <S%H6030><s%> answered בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁכֶ֨ם <S%H7927><s%> Shechem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמ֥וֹר <S%H2544><s%> and Hamor אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> his father בְּמִרְמָ֖ה <S%H4820><s%> deceitfully וַיְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> and said אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> because טִמֵּ֔א <S%H2930><s%> because he had defiled אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דִּינָ֥ה <S%H1783><s%> Dinah אֲחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H269><s%> their sister

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> about לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not נוּכַל֙ <S%H3201><s%> be able לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> do הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לָתֵת֙ <S%H5414><s%> to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֹתֵ֔נוּ <S%H269><s%> our sister לְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who ל֣וֹ עָרְלָ֑ה <S%H6190><s%> that is uncircumcised כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> would be a חֶרְפָּ֥ה <S%H2781><s%> for that [were] a reproach הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לָֽנוּ׃

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Only בְּזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> But in this נֵא֣וֹת <S%H225><s%> will we consent לָכֶ֑ם אִ֚ם <S%H518><s%> if תִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become כָמֹ֔נוּ <S%H3644><s%> like לְהִמֹּ֥ל <S%H4135><s%> of you be circumcised לָכֶ֖ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָֽר׃ <S%H2145><s%> unto you If ye will be as we [be] that every male

וְנָתַ֤נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> Then will we give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1323><s%> our daughters לָכֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1323><s%> your daughters נִֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> unto you and we will take לָ֑נוּ וְיָשַׁ֣בְנוּ <S%H3427><s%> to us and we will dwell אִתְּכֶ֔ם <S%H854><s%> for וְהָיִ֖ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> and become לְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> with you and we will become one

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׁמְע֛וּ <S%H8085><s%> But if ye will not hearken אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to us לְהִמּ֑וֹל <S%H4135><s%> unto us to be circumcised וְלָקַ֥חְנוּ <S%H3947><s%> then will we take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּתֵּ֖נוּ <S%H1323><s%> our daughter וְהָלָֽכְנוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> and we will be gone

וַיִּֽיטְב֥וּ <S%H3190><s%> seemed דִבְרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1697><s%> And their words בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> affliction חֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2544><s%> Hamor וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> affliction שְׁכֶ֥ם <S%H7927><s%> and Shechem בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son חֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2544><s%> Hamor's

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not אֵחַ֤ר <S%H309><s%> deferred הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> And the young man לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> not to do הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> the thing כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because חָפֵ֖ץ <S%H2654><s%> because he had delight בְּבַֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> in Jacob's וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נִכְבָּ֔ד <S%H3513><s%> and he [was] more honourable מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> than all the house אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> of his father

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came חֲמ֛וֹר <S%H2544><s%> And Hamor וּשְׁכֶ֥ם <S%H7927><s%> and Shechem בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> unto the gate עִירָ֑ם <S%H5892><s%> of their city וַֽיְדַבְּר֛וּ <S%H1696><s%> and communed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> with the men עִירָ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> of their city לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְֽׁלֵמִ֧ים <S%H8003><s%> [are] peaceable הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> like אִתָּ֗נוּ <S%H854><s%> with וְיֵשְׁב֤וּ <S%H3427><s%> us therefore let them dwell בָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> in the land וְיִסְחֲר֣וּ <S%H5503><s%> and trade אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> therein for the land הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold רַֽחֲבַת־ <S%H7342><s%> behold [it is] large יָדַ֖יִם <S%H3027><s%> enough לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> for them אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתָם֙ <S%H1323><s%> their daughters נִקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> let us take לָ֣נוּ לְנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> to us for wives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> them our daughters נִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and let us give לָהֶֽם׃

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Only בְּ֠זֹאת <S%H2063><s%> Only herein יֵאֹ֨תוּ <S%H225><s%> consent לָ֤נוּ הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> will the men לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> unto us for to dwell אִתָּ֔נוּ <S%H854><s%> for לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> to become לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> with us to be one בְּהִמּ֥וֹל <S%H4135><s%> among us be circumcised לָ֙נוּ֙ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> if every male כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> as they נִמֹּלִֽים׃ <S%H4135><s%> as they [are] circumcised

מִקְנֵהֶ֤ם <S%H4735><s%> [Shall] not their cattle וְקִנְיָנָם֙ <S%H7075><s%> and their substance וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּהֶמְתָּ֔ם <S%H929><s%> and every beast הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not לָ֖נוּ הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only נֵא֣וֹתָה <S%H225><s%> of theirs [be] ours? only let us consent לָהֶ֔ם וְיֵשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> unto them and they will dwell אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַיִּשְׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> hearkened אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חֲמוֹר֙ <S%H2544><s%> And unto Hamor וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שְׁכֶ֣ם <S%H7927><s%> and unto Shechem בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יֹצְאֵ֖י <S%H3318><s%> all that went out שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate עִיר֑וֹ <S%H5892><s%> of his city וַיִּמֹּ֙לוּ֙ <S%H4135><s%> was circumcised כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> and every male כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹצְאֵ֖י <S%H3318><s%> all that went out שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate עִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H5892><s%> of his city
